title: MIUI 6 4.8.21 [BETA]
description:
TO INSTALL:

1.Download the ROM
2.Place it in folder "downloaded_rom" in your SD.
3.Go to the updater app on the Mi 3W
4.Choose "select update package" from the menu of the updater.
5.Browse to the ROM folder and select it.
6.After the update is done,Reboot.
7.Have fun and leave a comment!

**If u face any issues try clearing DATA/CACHE.


!!!!!PLEASE MAKE SURE THAT YOU ARE ON DEVELOPER ROM BEFORE UPDATING!!!!!
